<!--{{Description|}}-->
'''Fortuitous Invitation''' is a part of the [[The Exquisite Night Chimes]] [[Event]] in [[Version 3.4]] that allows the player to choose one of the following 4 star Liyue characters for free as part of its event.

==Requirements==
When the [[Festive Fever (The Exquisite Night Chimes)|Festive Fever]] reaches 800, the player will have the opportunity to invite a character to join their Party.

==Available Characters==
{{Card|Beidou}}
{{Card|Chongyun}}
{{Card|Ningguang}}
{{Card|Xiangling}}
{{Card|Xingqiu}}
{{Card|Xinyan}}
{{Card|Yanfei}}
{{Card|Yun Jin}}
{{Card|Yaoyao}}
